"'Fresh'" is a song by the R&B funk group Kool & the Gang. Released as a single
in 1985 from the group's album of the previous year, [[Emergency (Kool & the
Gang album)|Emergency]], the song peaked at #11 on the UK chart, #9 on the U.S.
Hot 100 charts, and was number one on both the U.S. R&B and dance
charts. The song introduced a new meaning to the word
"fresh," meaning "good."
categories: Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs number-one singles
Billboard Hot Dance Club Songs number-one singles
Songs written by Sandy Linzer and Denny Randell
